title: My Dream Job Analysis
short_summary: Structured analysis of target roles, skills, and career positioning strategy
summary: Career strategy and analytics project focused on defining an ideal role profile, identifying skill gaps, and aligning technical and domain experience with long-term professional goals. Combines qualitative reasoning with structured analysis to guide portfolio development and job targeting.

datasets.dataset_value: Dream Job Role Criteria and Skill Mapping

components.name: My Dream Job by Region
components.objective: Identify optimal U.S. regions for a Supply Chain Analyst career in Consumer Staples, Industrials, and Information Technology based on economic viability.
components.business_value: Improved workforce placement strategy by identifying high-viability U.S. regions for supply chain roles using economic and industry benchmarks.

components.name: My Dream Job by Industry
components.objective: Determine the most stable industry for Supply Chain Analysts using profitability, growth, and financial health benchmarks.
components.business_value: Assessed industry stability using profitability and growth metrics to guide long-term workforce and investment strategy.

components.name: My Dream Job by Company
components.objective: Pinpoint top Consumer Staples companies in IL/VA using profit frontier analysis.
components.business_value: Applied profit frontier analysis to identify top-performing Consumer Staples firms in Illinois and Virginia.
